headline: How the Recent Price Dip Shapes the Outlook for Realty Income in 2025
summary: Trying to figure out what to do with Realty Income stock right now? You are not alone. With shares closing most recently at $58.13, there is a lot for investors to unpack following some interesting price moves. Over the last week, the stock dipped 2.4%. Looking at a broader view, especially over the past month, it has ticked up by 1.3%. Year-to-date, Realty Income is up a healthy 10.5%, even though the 1-year return is basically flat at 0.1%. For those considering the long term, the last five...
